DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Cauliflower Mushroom extract promotion immunity . The investigator measure promotion immunity parameter , include Cytotoxicity , Cytokine ( IL-4 , IL-10 , IFN- γ , TNF-α ) , CBC ( WBC , RBC , Hb , Hct , MCV , MCH , MCHC , PLT ) , monitor blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Cauliflower Mushroom Extract Promotion Immunity
DOC.criteria: Males female 3065 year old Weight within ±30 % ideal body weight Able give inform consent WBC concentration 3000 ㎕ Allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product Diagnosed gastrointestinal disease Immunerelated diseases , severe hepatic , renal failure , diabetes History reaction test product gastrointestinal disease Crohn 's disease gastrointestinal surgery History alcohol substance abuse Participation clinical trial within past 2 month Laboratory test , medical psychological condition deem investigator interfere successful participation study Pregnant lactate woman etc .
